overview: The monsoons have washed Mumbai. RAVARANA has just come out on parole. He is nothing but a security guard in Mumbai. He, along with his sister Zeenat, lives a life in Chawl. Every day is a struggle and existence is hand to mouth. Both are in their late 30s and life seems to be an exercise in defeat.One day they meet a bizarre boy, Vasu.
title: Mayasabha

original_title: तू मेरी मैं तेरा मैं तेरा तू मेरी
overview: When a carefree NRI wedding planner and a headstrong novelist collide during a wild summer in Croatia, sparks fly in ways neither expected. What begins as playful clashes soon transforms into something deeper – only to be tested when love, family, and tradition pull them in opposite directions.
title: Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri

overview: Set against the backdrop of the 1971 war, follows the life of second Lieutenant Arun Khetrapal.
title: Ikkis

overview: Ten Friends Navigate Their Complex Lives Grappling With Mental Health Issues , Trauma And Personal Struggles As They Try To Find Hope And Resilience In The Face Of Adversity
title: UKV's Dandelions

overview: A police officer's pursuit of truth in a shocking prison crime intertwines with the lives of a widowed prison guard and a soon to be released inmate, unravelling a web of morality and redemption.
title: Vadh 2

overview: Bantoo, an Indian wedding band trumpet player risks everything to go on a journey of finding his own tune, his own music.
title: Ustad Bantoo

original_title: Oh Laila Tere Peeche Padd Gaye Apni Jaan Nisaar Kar Gaye
overview: 3 Majnus And 33 Lailas !!!!!!  Just Imagine The Chaos................
title: Oh Laila Tere Peeche Padd Gaye Apni Jaan Nisaar Kar Gaye

original_title: Haye Hukku Haye Hukku Haaye Haaye Haaye
overview: Daksh and Insha Are Close Friends Who Have Never Seen Each Other Romantically, But Their Families Misinterpret Their Bond And Arrange Their Engagement  Desperate To Escape , They Make A Dramatic Announcement - Daksh Declares That He Is Gay, While Insha A Lesbian - And The Engagement Is Immediately Called Off Leaving Their Families In Shock , What Begins As A Silly Plan To Avoid Marriage Slowly Backfires When Daksh And Insha, Spending More Time Together Amidst The Chaos , Begin To Develop Real Feelings Now Trapped By Their Own Lie , They Must Find The Courage To Confess Both The Truth And Their Love Turning The Raita They Created Into A Happily-Ever-After
title: Haye Hukku Haye Hukku Haaye Haaye Haaye

overview: Get Ready For The Ultimate Adventure "Jee Le Zaraa" Join The Journey Of Friendship , Self-Discovery And Thrilling Experiences With Laughter , Excitement And Unforgettable Moments , This Series Will Take You On A Ride Of A Lifetime
title: Jim Jam Jelly

overview: A Sequel to Pati Patni Aur Woh
title: Pati Patni aur Woh Do

overview: An AI-generated film about the Hindu god Hanuman; it will draw from the sacred texts of Indian epic 'Ramayana' and Puranic literature to create what producers describe as an “awe-inspiring, visual odyssey designed to be enjoyed as a shared experience in theaters.”
title: Chiranjeevi Hanuman: The Eternal

overview: Sequel to Mohit Suri's 2007 cult film 'Awarapan'.
title: Awarapan 2

overview: Two fierce female agents tackle dangerous missions in a thrilling world of espionage, as they navigate perilous situations, execute daring stunts, and face unexpected turns in this action-packed adventure.
title: Alpha

original_title: Hai Jawani Toh Ishq Hona Hai
overview: A comic entertainer.
title: Hai Jawani Toh Ishq Hona Hai

original_title: नागज़िला: नाग लोक का पहला कांड
overview: The first chapter of a high-concept creature comedy trilogy, where an ordinary man's life takes a wild turn when he encounters a cunning, mystical snake-leading to an unpredictable battle of wits, chaos, and laughter.
title: Naagzilla: Naag Lok Ka Pehla Kaand

overview: A love story set against the backdrop of a war.
title: Love and War

overview: First part of the epic Ramayana Duology.
title: Ramayana: Part One

overview: The Indian Film Adaptation Of The Bone-Chilling Video Game - Mouthwashing
title: Mouthwashing : The Film

overview: Mr. Teacher, a quiet and principled schoolteacher, is devastated after losing his only child in a tragic road accident. The very same day, at the accident site, he comes across another injured boy-abandoned, nameless, and unconscious. Everyone around looks the other way, but Mr. Teacher steps in to help. As he nurses the boy back to health, he discovers the child is a victim of a deeper evil-caught in the clutches of a trafficking network. What begins as an act of kindness becomes a mission of justice.
title: BAHUBURA

overview: The eighth installment in the Maddock Supernatural Cinematic Universe. Plot TBA.
